name: Happy Orchard
description:
Requires Java to run!

Happy Orchard is a hybrid match-3/farming idle game: complete match-3 levels to collect coins and level up, grow and harvest fruit from trees to further increase your revenue, and purchase upgrades to improve your orchards and unlock special power-ups!

Current Features:

  • 15 match-3 levels separated into 3 stages. Levels reward coins and exp when initially beaten, or when you get a new high score.
  • Three orchard areas to plant and grow fruit trees. Trees take some time to grow and produce fruit, but will continue to grow even when the game is closed.
  • Upgrades for each fruit, Including "super-fruit" power-ups that can be crafted and used in the match levels.

IMPORTANT: This game is still fairly early in development, and may have some graphical/balance issues. 

Currently known issues:

  • Experience bar doesn't work properly
  • Some buttons don't animate correctly

Any and all feedback is greatly appreciated. Happy farming!
